citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:17pm on
25-JUL-19.
The Licensee's wife was able to confirm that no one was available for inspection at that time.
